A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I feel as though critics have been screened a different film than the one I watched. \nId like to say that I am by no means a fan boy. I did not watch trailers leading up to this films release nor am I emotionally involved with the Star Wars legacy.\nThat being said ... this was a flat out terrible film. And I really mean that. This is the first movie I've ever watched that made plot decisions at the EXPENSE of its own audience. Nothing more needs to be said.
